document.full_text: more than 250 people were killed in seven southern u.s. states in one of the deadliest series of tornadoes to hit the united states in recent decades, officials said on thursday.
document.title: factbox: deadliest tornado days in u.s. history
lines_and_colors: more than 250 people were killed in seven southern u.s. states in one of the deadliest series of tornadoes to hit the united states in recent decades, officials said on thursday.
